title: Random gift from riot??
body: * So i just saved up my points to buy the legendary alien invader heimerdinger skin using the new feature and after i had bought the skin, i randomly got gifted two skins? reaper soraka than zombie brand ? how did i manage to get them lol**{{champion:22}} **

replies.body:
Hey there,

This happens when you get a legendary or higher skin from the spinning axe causing another skin to drop for you.

This could theoretically continue to occur, however the chances are slim.
